footnotes.english_hilali_khan:
(V.97:1) "Therein (that night) is decreed every matter of ordainments." [The Qur’ân, (Verse 44:4)]**
** i.e., the matters of deaths, births, provisions, calamities for the whole (coming) year as decreed by Allâh.

translations.english_saheeh: Indeed, We sent it [i.e., the Qur’ān] down during the Night of Decree.
translations.english_hilali_khan: Verily, We have sent it (this Qur’ân) down in the night of Al-Qadr (Decree).[1]
translations.english_rwwad: Indeed, We sent this [Qur’an] down in the Night of Decree.

translations.english_saheeh: And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?
translations.english_hilali_khan: And what will make you know what the night of Al-Qadr (Decree) is?
translations.english_rwwad: How do you know what the Night of Decree is?

arabic_text: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ

translations.english_saheeh: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.
translations.english_rwwad: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.

arabic_text: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرٖ
phonetic: 97.4 Tanazzalu Al-Malā'ikatu Wa Ar-Rūĥu Fīhā Bi'idhni Rabbihim Min Kulli 'Amrin

footnotes.english_saheeh: [1955]- Bringing the exact measures apportioned for everything by Allāh in the course of the coming year.

translations.english_saheeh: The angels and the Spirit [i.e., Gabriel] descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.[1955]
translations.english_hilali_khan: Therein descend the angels and the Rûh [Jibrîl (Gabrîl)] by Allâh’s Permission with all Decrees,
translations.english_rwwad: On that night the angels and the Spirit [Gabriel] descend by their Lord’s permission with all decrees.

footnotes.english_hilali_khan: (V.97:5) Narrated ‘Âishah رضي الله عنها: Allâh’s Messenger صلى الله عليه وسلم said, "Search for the Night of Qadr in the odd nights of the last ten nights of Ramadan." (Sahih Al-Bukhari, Vol. 3, Hadith No.234).

translations.english_saheeh: Peace it is[1956] until the emergence of dawn.
translations.english_hilali_khan: (All that night), there is Peace (and Goodness from Allâh to His believing slaves) until the appearance of dawn.[2]
translations.english_rwwad: It is all peace until the break of dawn.
